segments.text: I'm watching the boy now, he's quite the climber.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balanced precariously on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks unstable, with splayed legs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see it tilting backward; it's almost certainly going to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching upward, reaching deep into the 'COOKIE JAR' in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is in the jar, while the other holds a plate, presumably to collect his loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This bold act of defiance is happening just feet away from the unaware adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how focused he is on his mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself or break the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it could give way at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination is impressive, though perhaps misguided.
segments.speaker: PAR
